title: Sun demon

| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A demonic figure shining with the heat and fury of a fallen star.***“Behold him setting in his western skies, The shadows lengthening as the vapours rise.” -John Dryden, “Absalom and Achitophel”, I, 268. 1681. |

## Useful Info

**Sun demons** are [fire](/Fire "Fire")-themed [tier-3 demons](/Tier-3_demon "Tier-3 demon"). They are fast monsters with fiery melee attacks (+10-19 fire damage). They can be found in [the Abyss](/The_Abyss "The Abyss"), [Pandemonium](/Pandemonium "Pandemonium"), created by [Summon Demon](/Summon_Demon "Summon Demon"), or found in various demon-based [vaults](/Vault "Vault").

## Tips & Tricks

- Sun demons are a fairly strong monster, at least in places where [kobold demonologists](/Kobold_demonologist "Kobold demonologist") and [orc sorcerers](/Orc_sorcerer "Orc sorcerer") are relevant threats. They hit moderately hard in melee, especially without rF+, and they are fast, making escape more difficult.
- They are vulnerable to cold. With a few points in Evocations, a [wand of iceblast](/Wand_of_iceblast "Wand of iceblast") can do the trick.

## History

- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), sun demons could [see invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible") and were [vulnerable to water](/Category:Water_vulnerability "Category:Water vulnerability").

Sun demon

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
sun demon 3 
HP 36-74
HD 10
XP 807
Speed 12
AC 10
EV 12
Will 80
Attack1 30 (hit: fire)


Resistances rF+++
rElec
rPois+
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities Cold
Holy
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Open doors
Holiness Demonic
Size Medium
Type sun demon, sun demon
Flags Flying
A demonic figure shining with the heat and fury of a fallen star.

“Behold him setting in his western skies,
The shadows lengthening as the vapours rise.”
-John Dryden, “Absalom and Achitophel”, I, 268. 1681.

Useful Info

Sun demons are fire-themed tier-3 demons. They are fast monsters with fiery melee attacks (+10-19 fire damage). They can be found in the Abyss, Pandemonium, created by Summon Demon, or found in various demon-based vaults.

Tips & Tricks

  • Sun demons are a fairly strong monster, at least in places where kobold demonologists and orc sorcerers are relevant threats. They hit moderately hard in melee, especially without rF+, and they are fast, making escape more difficult.
  • They are vulnerable to cold. With a few points in Evocations, a wand of iceblast can do the trick.

History

  • Prior to 0.28, sun demons could see invisible and were vulnerable to water.

rawPage:
{{version031}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Sun demons''' are [[fire]]-themed [[tier-3 demon]]s. They are fast monsters with fiery melee attacks (+10-19 fire damage). They can be found in [[the Abyss]], [[Pandemonium]], created by [[Summon Demon]], or found in various demon-based [[vault]]s.

==Tips & Tricks==
*Sun demons are a fairly strong monster, at least in places where [[kobold demonologist]]s and [[orc sorcerer]]s are relevant threats. They hit moderately hard in melee, especially without rF+, and they are fast, making escape more difficult.
*They are vulnerable to cold. With a few points in Evocations, a [[wand of iceblast]] can do the trick.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.28]], sun demons could [[see invisible]] and were [[:Category:Water_vulnerability|vulnerable to water]].

[[Category:Demon]]
